name: NimonaFinalProject
description:
This WIP game was created as a final project for my English 129 class, "Graphic Novels and Comics Poetics". In this game, I tried to transform a graphic novel to a visual novel format, while exploring player choice/alternative endings.

"Nimona" is not owned by me; it was created by Noelle Stevenson. Music credit belongs to Kevin MacLeod.
